column3: Look, Avere! All these people have come to make you a gift of their souls! Isn't that kind of them?
Even <Split(<Highlight>ObjectParameter(1)</Highlight>, ,1)/> is here! Now your dream of becoming like <If(PlayerParameter(4))>her<Else/>him</If> can come true!
What...what have you done? Aveeerrreee! Noooooo!
